title: Fuusen Shoujo Temple-chan (Temple the Balloonist)
synopsis: When a little girl who loves music sneaks aboard a balloon, she soon finds herself far from home. She meets other children who also love music and agree to help her find her way back home.
voices: ['Takizawa, Kumiko', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Hisamatsu, Yuuko', 'Yano, Youko', 'Kimotsuki, Kaneta', 'Tani, Ikuko', 'Tsukase, Noriko']
staff: [['Okuda, Seiji', ['Episode Director']], ['Ueda, Hidehito', ['Episode Director']], ['Nunokawa, Yuuji', ['Episode Director']], ['Nagaki, Bonjin', ['Episode Director']]]
